channel.title: Element-X Base Shops
channel.description: Okay so I can get items into shops with no problems, easy. But I can't seem to find out how to edit their prices in the shops. Which file controls the item's prices? Note: I am using Element-X 562 Base. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Element-X Base Shops

item.description:
@Zest wrote:

Okay so I can get items into shops with no problems, easy. But I can’t seem to find out how to edit their prices in the shops. Which file controls the item’s prices? Note: I am using Element-X 562 Base.
Thanks in advance.
